reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's gingham pattern and find it well-made, comfortable, and perfect for summer wear, particularly for brunch and lunch events.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blue check XXL
items.body: Beautiful material, fits exactly as shown and size is perfect. I was a bit scared to order this because I have such a hard time finding a dress very suitable for my granddaughter's wedding. I love this dress as it is nice enough for her wedding but also perfect for casual dinners out and for church. I ordered the XXL and don't need any alterations for once! Hooray for me! It's seems to be comfortable at this point just trying it on so I can't really say one way or the other how it will feel during the summer weather. Read more
items.author: Old Lady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modest, Comfortable, and So Classy ‚Äî I‚Äôm in Love!
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this dress! I chose the coffee gingham color after doing my color season analysis, and it truly complements my skin tone beautifully ‚Äî my sister-in-law even said I looked cute in it! üòÑ What I love most is how modest and elegant it is, while still being super comfortable. The fabric feels great for summer, and yes, it has pockets ‚Äî which is always a win! I often throw on a denim jacket like in my photo, and it instantly looks put together whether I‚Äôm headed to church, running errands, or meeting friends for a social event. If you‚Äôre looking for a dress that‚Äôs classy, flattering, and versatile, I highly recommend this one. It‚Äôs definitely worth the hype, Read more
items.author: MHolmes

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, true to size, and comfortable
items.body: For starters, the dress is well made and even lined. It is really cute with a short cardigan sweater, which is how I wear it. The top isn't the best-fitting. I think it's a little too loose and structure-less. It needs some kind of elastic for shape. However, the sweater transforms it and I get lots of compliments on the dress. I was on the fence about keeping it, but as I said, it looks great with the sweater and fits comfortably all day long. It also doesn't wrinkle easily. Read more
items.author: C Miles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your go to fall dress üçÇüçÅ
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I‚Äôm obsessed with this dress! It‚Äôs perfect for fall üçÇüçÅ It‚Äôs comfortable, flattering, and stylish! It‚Äôs true to size and a nice material. It‚Äôs stretchy around the torso so you don‚Äôt have to worry about squeezing into it. It has pockets and is a lighter material. I think this dress would look great with a jean jacket and other accessories! Perfect for fall family photos, pumpkin patches, apple picking, and more! Read more
items.author: Kelsey Farris

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love style and color, not a fan of chest area should have a zipper
items.body: Fits well on the lower but there is not a lot of stretch in the chest area so it‚Äôs pretty difficult to get off without ripping but If I got a bigger size it would be too big. I like the color and style a lot, I think there should be a zipper. Read more
items.author: Marisa Henness

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's exactly what I was looking for.
items.body: The fabric on this dress is a slightly thicker woven. The skirt hangs down in a slight A-line to my ankles (I'm 5'4") and is lined. I would say the blue is not navy but rather a more cornflower blue. I'm pairing it with a white sweater as shown to dress it up a little. The bodice is more fitted but with a stretchy back so it is comfortable and cute. Overall I thought this was a well made dress and it looks really good on. Read more
items.author: Coco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but make sure yours is fully lined
items.body: This fit me perfectly. Now, there isn‚Äôt any stretch to the fabric, so it‚Äôs one of those garments that either fits your shape or doesn‚Äôt. My dress was fully lined (which was good since the fabric is so thin, would have been see-through otherwise). Not a true gingham, just a printed-on design. I also ordered the brown, but on that one the back wasn‚Äôt sewn properly, so I easily returned it. I think this dress so cute, and although the skirt goes straight down, no extra fabric to twirl, at least it will not blow up in the wind! However, my husband said I look like a tablecloth. He evidently has no imagination. Read more
items.author: GreenMermaid

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sizing and lining not the same with dresses.
items.body: I ordered 2 of these dresses.One in the navy blue and one in the green.Both a size large. The blue fit nicely and didn't have a lining, only in the bust area. The green was lined all the way down. The green was tighter in the bust area and the lining made the dress too poofy. I don't understand why one was lined but not the other. There is inconsistent sizing as well as pattern match up. I sent the green back . Cute dress, modest and light for summer. The navy was not see through and this dress really doesn't need to be lined on the bottom. I ordered the pink to see if that one will not be lined and hopefully fits like the navy blue one. Update, the pink was also lined and too tight. I returned it. Read more
items.author: Shoperlady

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brilliant Red, Pink Purple, Black, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Light Blue, Red, Red Black, Navy, Pink, Beige, Yellow, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
